description: Codex platform integration and test/doc alignment
changelog:
**New Features:**
- feat(platform): add Codex as a first-class platform in AI tool registry (types, CLI flag, init options, configurator dispatch)
- feat(templates): add Codex skill templates under `src/templates/codex/skills/*/SKILL.md`
- feat(configurator): add `configureCodex()` and template collection mapping to `.agents/skills/<name>/SKILL.md`
- feat(runtime): extend Python `cli_adapter.py` / `registry.py` to support Codex detection and command path mapping

**Testing:**
- test(codex): add focused coverage for Codex template loading, init behavior, managed path detection, platform configurator output, and regression checks
- test: full suite passing (`pnpm lint`, `pnpm typecheck`, `pnpm test`, `pnpm test:coverage`)

**Documentation & Workflow:**
- docs(workflow): add `improve-ut` skill/command to standardize UT planning and reporting
- docs(spec): update backend platform integration guidance for Codex scope and common pitfalls
notes: No migration required. Existing projects can adopt Codex via re-init/update workflows; no file rename/delete migration is needed.
